effect.scarlet-violet: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.the-teal-mask: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.
